title: 3 and Out - Darnold Trade Dissection, Defending Justin Fields; Headlines; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Darnold Trade Dissection, Defending Justin Fields; Headlines; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, John dissects all the sides of the Jets trading Sam Darnold to the Panthers for both teams and defends increasingly polarizing Ohio State QB Justin Fields as the NFL Draft approaches. He also gives his takes on the top headlines from around the league and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
